name: Pacifist Game Jam
description:
You are a diplomat from the planet Col'jack Prime, and you spend your time as a diplomat settling conflicts around various alien embassies. 

You have been called to the Zardo embassy, where various political leaders are dependent on your advice and ideas in order to prevent the recent talks of a planetary war.

Unfortunately, your usual valuable premium spaceship is in the space mechanic, so you resort to using the old spaceship you had in your hanger. Time is crucial, for failing to make it to the embassy could spell war!

Controls: W and S are to climb the ladder. A and D are used to go back and forth. E to interact. P.S make sure to read the instruction pamphlet :) and also to turn on the engine at the start of every level.

Credits: FrodotimBaku did the Artwork portion. Yammmmmy did the coding portion.  Other personal friends helped playtest
